评论详情: Love this design so much, the quality, fabrication combos, and the how many looks these can be worn with. Unfortunately for me, my heel slips out a little with each step even though it’s perfect size.
Very happy with this purchase.  Dress up / dress down.  Look put together either way! Comfortable for all day wear.
These shoes look great and fit perfectly. I can wear them all day and they’re comfortable. I’ve gotten tons of compliments on them.

These have dropped quite a bit in price since I purchased them!  They are well worth the money.  I recently purchased these stylish sneakers in bone corduroy, and I couldn’t be happier with my choice. Straight out of the box, they looked sleek, modern, and exactly like the product images online. The color combination is versatile, pairing effortlessly with joggers, jeans, or even a cute skirt. The corduroy detail adds a unique touch, and the overall craftsmanship is quality. Comfort-wise, these sneakers are great. They feel supportive without being too bulky. I’m excited to wear them more once the snow melts.  AS FOR SIZING, they fit true to size. I ordered my regular size, and it was spot-on.    In conclusion, these sneakers are a fantastic blend of style and functionality. They’ll quickly become my go-to shoes for casual outings. Highly recommend them for anyone looking for a reliable and fashionable pair of sneakers.

评论概述: 2nd pair was clearly worn before I got them
评论详情: I typically wear a size 8-8.5 in women's shoes, and I found that these shoes run a tad bit smaller, as I had to return the size 8 for an 8.5. Both sizes styles were adorable, and I appreciated the stiffness of the shoe, which was comfortable and supportive.  The return process for the size 8 was very easy since I tried them free for 7 days before deciding to buy. However, I would rate the second pair I received (size 8.5) with only 1 star because they were damaged and of poor quality. It was clear that the shoes had been worn indoors, as the bottoms were relatively clean, but both shoes had small stains on the fabric, as shown in the pictures above. I tried to remove the stains, and while they became less noticeable, ultimately, they didn’t come out.  I was disappointed because this pair fit well, and I intended to keep them. I'm returning them for a third roll of the dice and ordering another size 8.5 in the same color and style, hoping they will arrive in new condition. I’ll update this review once I receive the third pair. Three strikes, you’re out! TBD…

评论概述: So stylish. So comfortable. 10 out of 10
评论详情: These are by far a pair of the most comfortable shoes I’ve owned in a while. I never write reviews but I had to for these because of how well they are made. I was surprised because my feet always hurt and since having my daughters, my ankles constantly swell. These shoes alleviated any pain and prevented swelling. I highly recommend and I hope people have the same results I did. I will be buying another pair in different color.
